title: New Jungle Item Suggestion | Pre-Season 6
body:
Lets talk about jungle items and the role in general. The thing that inspired me to try to think of a new **Jungle** specific item is because if me and you think about it real clearly the only 'jungle' items LoL has this very day are the enchanted smite items - {{item:3709}} {{item:3722}} {{item:3707}} {{item:3724}} etc. Now i'm not a jungler player myself or anything but the point is the item I have thought out is  a item that has passives aura effects that help the team out etc that would make junglers feel more unique instead of a jungler having to use **support** items (if they wanted to help out the team, for instance tank ekko jungle; {{item:2049}} {{item:3190}} and sometimes {{item:3800}}) they can have a 'smite required' item that will be just as useful as the support items (which were intended for supports but jungles now use them which I think is pretty dumb)

Item name: Up to Riot (couldn't think of a descent name)
Price: 2750

Stats: 
+350 Health
+45 Magic Resistance
+45 Armour
+150% Base health regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE PASSIVE: Grants 8-12% Movement speed in rivers, bushes etc (Based on level)
UNIQUE ACTIVE: Grants a bonus active to consumer that makes slows, taunts, knock-ups, blinds, Fears, charms, Roots etc last an addition 1.5 seconds lasting 8 seconds (45 second cooldown)  (click on active; when active a green like elixir effect will start)
UNIQUE AURA - Legion: Grants nearby allies 15% Base Health Regen 10% attack speed

Build path:
Smite of any kind; Kindlegem; Negatron cloak; Wardens Mail; Crystallien Bracer (This build path was only a example of what it would be like; Riot can change it but has to have smite required)

Hope you think my new item is interesting (please no haters, not saying jungle is a bad role ;) )
Riot if you do include this item in season 6 feel free to change the stats of the item, active cooldown amount or anything like that the only thing Just give credits where credits are due ;)

> Sincerely, Pr0Ki1l3r
>  _Let your dreams be dreams .. **Just do it**
_
